question: Which quantity might correspond to the y-axis on this graph: [H+], pH, or [OH-]?<image 1>
description: The image shows a simple line graph with the x-axis labeled "[HCl]" and the y-axis labeled with a question mark. The graph depicts a straight line that starts at the origin (0,0) and slopes upward to the right, indicating a positive correlation between the concentration of HCl and the quantity represented on the y-axis.
